data.lyric:
[ti:Golden]
[ar:Harry Styles]
[al:Fine Line]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Golden - Harry Styles (哈里·斯泰尔斯)
[00:04.60]Lyrics by：Harry Styles/Mitch Rowland/Thomas Hull/Tyler Johnson
[00:09.20]Composed by：Harry Styles/Mitch Rowland/Thomas Hull/Tyler Johnson
[00:13.80]Hey
[00:28.64]Golden golden golden as I open my eyes
[00:35.46]Holding focus hoping take me back to the light
[00:43.12]I know you were way too bright for me
[00:48.17]I'm hopeless broken so you wait for me in the sky
[01:00.18]Brown my skin just right
[01:07.13]You're so golden
[01:14.07]You're so golden
[01:17.44]I'm out of my head and I know that you're scared
[01:20.39]Because hearts get broken
[01:22.57]I don't want to be alone
[01:25.99]I don't want to be alone when it ends
[01:29.72]Don't wanna let you know
[01:32.82]I don't want to be alone
[01:35.45]But I can feel it take a hold
[01:38.09]I can feel it take a hold
[01:39.76]I can feel you take control
[01:41.50]I can feel you take control
[01:42.54]Of who I am and all I've ever known
[01:46.60]Lovin' is the antidote
[01:49.14]Golden
[01:55.18]You're so golden
[01:58.56]I don't want to be alone
[02:01.99]You're so golden
[02:08.83]You're so golden
[02:12.29]I'm out of my head and I know that you're scared
[02:15.17]Because hearts get broken
[02:41.43]I know that you're scared because I'm so open
[02:49.96]You're so golden
[02:53.39]I don't want to be alone
[02:56.88]You're so golden
[03:00.31]You're so golden
[03:03.71]You're so golden
[03:07.37]I'm out of my head and I know that you're scared
[03:10.06]Because hearts get broken
data.trans:
[ti:Golden]
[ar:Harry Styles]
[al:Fine Line]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:04.60]//
[00:09.20]//
[00:13.80]//
[00:28.64]当我睁开眼睛 眼前金光灿烂
[00:35.46]集中注意力 盼望着带我回到光芒之地
[00:43.12]我知道你对我来说太过耀眼夺目
[00:48.17]我已绝望 痛彻心扉 请你在空中等候着我
[01:00.18]我褐色的肌肤与你相称
[01:07.13]你如金光般闪耀
[01:14.07]你如金光般闪耀
[01:17.44]我已失去理智 我知道你非常害怕
[01:20.39]因为心支离破碎
[01:22.57]我不愿孤单一人
[01:25.99]我不愿在一切结束时形单影只
[01:29.72]我不想让你知道
[01:32.82]我不愿孤单一人
[01:35.45]可我感觉对你的渴望占据我的心
[01:38.09]可我感觉对你的渴望占据我的心
[01:39.76]我可以感觉到是你掌控一切
[01:41.50]我可以感觉到是你掌控一切
[01:42.54]你左右着我以及我熟知的一切
[01:46.60]只有你的爱能解救我
[01:49.14]熠熠生辉
[01:55.18]你如金光般闪耀
[01:58.56]我不愿孤单一人
[02:01.99]你如金光般闪耀
[02:08.83]你如金光般闪耀
[02:12.29]我已失去理智 我知道你非常害怕
[02:15.17]因为彼此的心支离破碎
[02:41.43]我知道你非常害怕 因为我对你敞开心扉
[02:49.96]你如金光般闪耀
[02:53.39]我不愿孤单一人
[02:56.88]你如金光般闪耀
[03:00.31]你如金光般闪耀
[03:03.71]你如金光般闪耀
[03:07.37]我已失去理智 我知道你非常害怕
[03:10.06]因为彼此的心支离破碎
